00033 void CnipolCalibHists::BookHists(std::string cutid)
00034 {
00035    string shName;
00036    TH1*   hist;
00037 
00038    fDir->cd();
00039 
00040    TAttMarker styleMarker;
00041    styleMarker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00042    styleMarker.SetMarkerSize(0.8);
00043    styleMarker.SetMarkerColor(kGreen+3);
00044 
00045    shName = "hDLVsChannel";
00046    hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00047    hist->SetTitle("; Channel Id; Dead Layer, #mug/cm^{2};");
00048    hist->SetOption("P E1 GRIDX");
00049    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00050    o[shName] = hist;
00051 
00052    shName = "hT0VsChannel";
00053    hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00054    hist->SetTitle("; Channel Id; T0, ns;");
00055    hist->SetOption("P E1 GRIDX");
00056    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00057    o[shName] = hist;
00058 
00059    shName = "hChi2NdfVsChannel";
00060    hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00061    hist->SetTitle("; Channel Id; #chi^{2}/ndf;");
00062    hist->SetOption("P GRIDX");
00063    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00064    o[shName] = hist;
00065 
00066    shName = "hLogChi2NdfVsChannel";
00067    hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00068    hist->SetTitle("; Channel Id; log(#chi^{2}/ndf);");
00069    hist->SetOption("P GRIDX");
00070    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00071    o[shName] = hist;
00072 
00073    shName = "hFitStatusVsChannel";
00074    hist = new TH1I(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00075    hist->SetTitle("; Channel Id; Fit Status;");
00076    hist->SetOption("hist GRIDX");
00077    //hist->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0, 2.2);
00078    o[shName] = hist;
00079 
00080    DrawObjContainer        *oc;
00081    DrawObjContainerMapIter  isubdir;
00082 
00083    for (int iChId=1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iChId++)
00084    {
00085       string sChId(MAX_CHANNEL_DIGITS, ' ');
00086       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iChId);
00087 
00088       string dName = "channel" + sChId;
00089 
00090       isubdir = d.find(dName);
00091 
00092       if ( isubdir == d.end()) { // if dir not found
00093          oc = new DrawObjContainer();
00094          oc->fDir = new TDirectoryFile(dName.c_str(), dName.c_str(), "", fDir);
00095       } else {
00096          oc = isubdir->second;
00097       }
00098 
00099       oc->fDir->cd();
00100 
00101       shName = "hAdcAmpltd_ch" + sChId;
00102       hist = new TH1I(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 255, 0, 255);
00103       hist->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00104       hist->SetTitle("; Amplitude, ADC; Events;");
00105       hist->SetFillColor(kGray);
00106 
00107       shName = "hMeanTimeVsEnergy" + sChId;
00108       hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00109       hist->SetTitle(";Deposited Energy, keV; Mean Time, ns;");
00110       hist->SetOption("E1 GRIDX");
00111       oc->o[shName] = hist;
00112 
00113       // If this is a new directory then we need to add it to the list
00114       if ( isubdir == d.end()) {
00115          d[dName] = oc;
00116       }
00117    }
00118 
00119 }

00123 void CnipolCalibHists::PostFill()
00124 {
00125    const Calibrator *calibrator = gAsymRoot->GetCalibrator();
00126 
00127    //ChannelCalibMapIter iCh  = calibrator->fChannelCalibs.begin();
00128    //ChannelCalibMapIter iChE = calibrator->fChannelCalibs.end();
00129    //for (; iCh!=iCh; ++iCh) {
00130    //}
00131 
00132    TH1* hDLVsChannel            = (TH1*) o["hDLVsChannel"];
00133    TH1* hT0VsChannel            = (TH1*) o["hT0VsChannel"];
00134    TH1* hChi2NdfVsChannel       = (TH1*) o["hChi2NdfVsChannel"];
00135    TH1* hLogChi2NdfVsChannel    = (TH1*) o["hLogChi2NdfVsChannel"];
00136    TH1* hFitStatusVsChannel     = (TH1*) o["hFitStatusVsChannel"];
00137 
00138    for (Int_t i=1; i<=hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(); ++i) {
00139 
00140       hDLVsChannel->SetBinContent(i, calibrator->GetDLWidth(i));
00141       hDLVsChannel->SetBinError(i, calibrator->GetDLWidthErr(i));
00142 
00143       hT0VsChannel->SetBinContent(i, calibrator->GetT0Coef(i));
00144       hT0VsChannel->SetBinError(i, calibrator->GetT0CoefErr(i));
00145 
00146       hChi2NdfVsChannel->SetBinContent(i, calibrator->GetBananaChi2Ndf(i));
00147       Double_t logChi2 = calibrator->GetBananaChi2Ndf(i) <= 0 ? 0 : TMath::Log( calibrator->GetBananaChi2Ndf(i)) ;
00148       hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->SetBinContent(i, logChi2 );
00149 
00150       hFitStatusVsChannel->SetBinContent(i, calibrator->GetFitStatus(i));
00151    }
00152 
00153    // Visualize the channel selection decision based on chi2
00154    Double_t meanDL = calibrator->GetMeanChannel().fDLWidth;
00155    Double_t rmsDL  = calibrator->GetMeanChannel().fDLWidthErr;
00156 
00157    TLine* lineMean = new TLine(1, meanDL, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanDL);
00158    lineMean->SetLineWidth(2);
00159    lineMean->SetLineColor(kGreen);
00160 
00161    TLine* lineRMSup = new TLine(1, meanDL+3.0*rmsDL, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanDL+3.0*rmsDL);
00162    lineRMSup->SetLineWidth(2);
00163    lineRMSup->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00164 
00165    TLine* lineRMSdown  = new TLine(1, meanDL-3.0*rmsDL, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanDL-3.0*rmsDL);
00166    lineRMSdown->SetLineWidth(2);
00167    lineRMSdown->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00168 
00169    hDLVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineMean);
00170    hDLVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMSup);
00171    hDLVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMSdown);
00172    hDLVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner();
00173 
00174    if (hDLVsChannel->GetYaxis()->GetXmax() < meanDL+3.0*rmsDL)
00175       hDLVsChannel->SetMaximum(1.1*(meanDL+3.0*rmsDL));
00176 
00177    if (hDLVsChannel->GetYaxis()->GetXmin() < meanDL-3.0*rmsDL)
00178       hDLVsChannel->SetMinimum((meanDL-3.0*rmsDL));
00179 
00180    // T0
00181    Double_t meanT0 = calibrator->GetMeanChannel().fT0Coef;
00182    Double_t rmsT0  = calibrator->GetMeanChannel().fT0CoefErr;
00183 
00184    lineMean = new TLine(1, meanT0, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanT0);
00185    lineMean->SetLineWidth(2);
00186    lineMean->SetLineColor(kGreen);
00187 
00188    lineRMSup = new TLine(1, meanT0+3.0*rmsT0, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanT0+3.0*rmsT0);
00189    lineRMSup->SetLineWidth(2);
00190    lineRMSup->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00191 
00192    lineRMSdown  = new TLine(1, meanT0-3.0*rmsT0, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanT0-3.0*rmsT0);
00193    lineRMSdown->SetLineWidth(2);
00194    lineRMSdown->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00195 
00196    hT0VsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineMean);
00197    hT0VsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMSup);
00198    hT0VsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMSdown);
00199    hT0VsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner();
00200 
00201    if (hT0VsChannel->GetYaxis()->GetXmax() < meanT0+3.0*rmsT0)
00202       hT0VsChannel->SetMaximum(1.1*(meanT0+3.0*rmsT0));
00203 
00204    if (hT0VsChannel->GetYaxis()->GetXmin() > meanT0-3.0*rmsT0)
00205       hT0VsChannel->SetMinimum((meanT0-3.0*rmsT0));
00206 
00207    // Visualize the channel selection decision based on chi2
00208    Double_t meanChi2 = calibrator->GetMeanOfLogsChannel().GetBananaChi2Ndf();
00209    meanChi2 = meanChi2 < 0 ? 0 : meanChi2;
00210    Double_t rmsChi2  = calibrator->GetRMSOfLogsBananaChi2Ndf();
00211 
00212    lineMean = new TLine(1, meanChi2, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanChi2);
00213    lineMean->SetLineWidth(2);
00214    lineMean->SetLineColor(kGreen);
00215 
00216    TLine* lineRMS  = new TLine(1, meanChi2+5.0*rmsChi2, hDLVsChannel->GetNbinsX(), meanChi2+5.0*rmsChi2);
00217    lineRMS->SetLineWidth(2);
00218    lineRMS->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00219 
00220    hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineMean);
00221    hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMS);
00222    hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner();
00223 
00224    if (hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->GetYaxis()->GetXmax() < meanChi2+5.0*rmsChi2)
00225       hLogChi2NdfVsChannel->SetMaximum(1.1*(meanChi2+5.0*rmsChi2));
00226 }
